# authorize(localizedReason:in:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Performs an authorization on the right with a window context you supply.

## Declaration

```swift
func authorize(localizedReason: String, in presentationContext: LAPresentationContext, completion handler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func authorize(localizedReason: String, in presentationContext: LAPresentationContext) async throws
```

## Discussion



## Authorizing a right

- **init()**: Creates a right using the default authorization requirements.
- **init(requirement:)**: Creates a right with the authentication requirements you supply.
- **tag**: An integer you use to identify a right.
- **authorize(localizedReason:completion:)**: Performs an authorization on the right.
